preventions.title: Stay home
preventions.description: Quarantine - a way to stop the spread of coronavirus

preventions.title: Limit personal meetings
preventions.description: Fewer contacts - less chance of infection

preventions.title: Maintain social distancing
preventions.description: Maintain at least 2 meters (6 feet) distance between yourself and anyone who is coughing or sneezing.

preventions.title: Wash your hands frequently
preventions.description: Clean your phone, keys and bank card after each exit to the street

preventions.title: When to use masks?
preventions.description: Wear a mask if you feel sick

preventions.title: Keep in touch with loved ones
preventions.description: Talk with friends and family, keep in touch with them
